page.title: 06Farm Life
page.content:
This time of year the farmers are letting the cattle out for the summer. I interveiwed a farmers wife and she told me that she had 500 acres, 250 acres of corn, wheat and barley and 250 acres for the cattle.There are two types of cattle. They sell the cattle three times during the year. Usually in January, November, and December.They check the cattle once in the morning and once at night to put water in the trough and to check to see if any of the cattle have infections.This farm has four combine tractors and lots of diggers and insecticide machinery.They buy the cattle when they are about 12 months old.The cattle are beef cattle.
By Faye Ellen Francis
